mapper.select: SELECT mem.m_nm, rep.report_content, ch.message FROM member mem JOIN report rep JOIN chat ch ON mem.m_idx=rep.m_report AND rep.chat_idx=ch.chat_idx WHERE rep.m_reported=#{arg0};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (match_idx, report_content, m_report, m_reported) VALUES (#{match_idx}, #{report_content}, #{m_report}, #{m_reported});
